title: Skinny Dipping
directions: Blend black beans, avocado, Greek yogurt, tomato, kefir, thyme, chives, mint, basil, hot sauce, vinegar, and sea salt in a blender until well combined; refrigerate until chilled, 1 hour to overnight.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
¼ cup low-fat plain kefir (yogurt drink)
